body_html: This change assumes that the maximum sequence length is known and fixed, which breaks backwards compatibility. It would make sense to fallback to the dynamic_rnn implementation in that scenario.
body_text: This change assumes that the maximum sequence length is known and fixed, which breaks backwards compatibility. It would make sense to fallback to the dynamic_rnn implementation in that scenario.
body: This change assumes that the maximum sequence length is known and fixed, which breaks backwards compatibility. It would make sense to fallback to the `dynamic_rnn` implementation in that scenario.
